text: Jilani: “Ana nkwaona akwawanganya wenu (ni Allah) awala wankwalumbanjila kunneka Allah? Munosyani, ana ni upandechi wetaka waagumbile? Kapena akwete wanganyao liunjili lyakamusyangana (najo Allah) ku mawunde?” Kapena twapele wanganyao (achimakafilio) chitabu, basi wanganyao ni ali ni umboni wakuonechela kuumila mu chalakwecho (wakwakundisya ukafili waowo)? (Ngwamba), nambo walupuso ngakulanganaga wane ni wane ikaweje ya chinyengo
